import React,{useEffect}from'react';import{Redirect}from'react-router-dom';import swal from'sweetalert';import axios from'axios';var Index=function Index(props){var Cart=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('myCart'));var Address=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('address'));var userId=props.userId;// console.log('ObjectId("'+userId+'")')
var completeOrder=function completeOrder(){axios({method:'POST',url:process.env.BACKEND_URL+'/order/createOrder',data:{cart:Cart,address:Address,creator:userId}}).then(function(res){swal({title:"Order created!",text:"Your Order is complete",icon:"success",buttons:{text:'OK'}});console.log(res);}).catch(function(err){return console.log(err);});};useEffect(function(){completeOrder();},[completeOrder]);return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Redirect,{to:"/"});};export default Index;
